named-query.name: CollectKeyInfoPk.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a.id FROM CollectKeyInfo a ORDER BY a.id.itemName, a.id.monitorId

named-query.name: CollectKeyInfo.findByCollectId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectKeyInfo a WHERE a.collectorid = :collectorid

named-query.name: CollectKeyInfo.findByMonitorId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectKeyInfo a WHERE a.id.monitorId = :monitorId

named-query.name: CollectData.findByTime
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectData a WHERE a.id.time >= :fromTime AND a.id.time <= :toTime AND a.id.collectorid IN :collectoridList ORDER BY a.id.time

named-query.name: CollectData.find
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectData a WHERE a.id.collectorid = :collectorid ORDER BY a.id.time

named-query.name: CollectData.findOrderByTimeDesc
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectData a WHERE a.id.collectorid = :collectorid AND a.id.time >= :startDate AND a.id.time < :endDate ORDER BY a.id.time desc

named-query.name: CollectData.findOrderByTimeAsc
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectData a WHERE a.id.collectorid = :collectorid AND a.id.time >= :startDate AND a.id.time < :endDate ORDER BY a.id.time

named-query.name: SummaryHour.findByTime
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SummaryHour a WHERE a.id.time >= :fromTime AND a.id.time <= :toTime AND a.id.collectorid IN :collectoridList ORDER BY a.id.time

named-query.name: SummaryHour.find
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SummaryHour a WHERE a.id.collectorid = :collectorid ORDER BY a.id.time

named-query.name: SummaryDay.findByTime
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SummaryDay a WHERE a.id.time >= :fromTime AND a.id.time <= :toTime AND a.id.collectorid IN :collectoridList ORDER BY a.id.time

named-query.name: SummaryDay.find
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SummaryDay a WHERE a.id.collectorid = :collectorid ORDER BY a.id.time

named-query.name: SummaryMonth.findByTime
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SummaryMonth a WHERE a.id.time >= :fromTime AND a.id.time <= :toTime AND a.id.collectorid IN :collectoridList ORDER BY a.id.time

named-query.name: SummaryMonth.find
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SummaryMonth a WHERE a.id.collectorid = :collectorid ORDER BY a.id.time
